name: Arianespace (Ariane ecosystem)
description: European launch services actor tied to the Ariane rocket ecosystem and institutional/commercial missions.
impact: Supports Europe’s access-to-space capability and satellite deployment infrastructure.

name: Airbus
description: Aircraft manufacturer driving efficiency, aerodynamics, digital manufacturing, and future low-carbon aviation pathways.
impact: Shapes global aviation standards through large-scale R&D and industrial deployment.

name: Dassault Systèmes
description: 3D design, simulation, and lifecycle platforms (CATIA, SOLIDWORKS) powering digital engineering and digital twins.
impact: Enables faster, less wasteful product development across manufacturing industries.

name: Sanofi
description: Pharmaceutical company active in vaccines and specialty medicines, investing in next-generation therapeutics.
impact: Industrial-scale health innovation and production capacity for global public health.

name: LVMH
description: Luxury group investing in sustainable materials, traceability, and digital retail experiences.
impact: Influences global consumer standards and supplier ecosystems through scale and brand power.

name: TotalEnergies
description: Energy company investing in renewables, power generation, and low-carbon projects alongside legacy operations.
impact: Large-scale capital allocation decisions affect the pace and shape of energy transition ecosystems.

name: Thales
description: Aerospace, defense, cybersecurity, and transport tech with emphasis on secure, reliable systems.
impact: Builds high-trust infrastructure where safety, security, and resilience are critical.

name: Criteo
description: Commerce media and advertising tech adapting targeting and measurement to privacy-driven constraints.
impact: Represents the shift toward privacy-aware marketing infrastructure and retail media ecosystems.

name: BlaBlaCar
description: Shared mobility platform connecting drivers and passengers for long-distance travel.
impact: Scaled trust-based coordination, increasing vehicle occupancy and improving travel affordability.

name: Doctolib
description: Healthcare scheduling and digital services platform used by medical professionals and patients across Europe.
impact: Reduces friction in access and coordination, a key lever in overloaded healthcare systems.

name: Mirakl
description: Marketplace platform enabling retailers and brands to run third-party marketplaces.
impact: Accelerates platformization of commerce for large organizations.

name: Alan
description: Digital health insurance and benefits platform focused on a simplified user experience and integrated services.
impact: Pushes insurers toward clearer UX and more service-oriented health journeys.

name: CEA
description: Major research organization spanning energy, digital tech, advanced engineering, and health sciences.
impact: A national-scale R&D engine feeding long-term scientific capability and industrial transfer.

name: ITER (in France)
description: International fusion research project aiming to demonstrate key elements of practical fusion energy.
impact: One of the world’s most ambitious clean-energy science efforts hosted in France.

name: Station F
description: Large startup campus in Paris hosting founders, programs, investors, and corporate partners.
impact: Creates innovation density: faster company formation and ecosystem cross-pollination.

name: Michelin
description: Mobility and materials leader investing in sustainable materials, circularity, and next-gen performance products.
impact: Drives materials innovation with downstream effects on efficiency, safety, and environmental footprint.

name: Puy du Fou
description: Immersive entertainment model built on live shows, storytelling craft, and operational excellence.
impact: A blueprint for narrative-led experience design at industrial scale.

name: Mistral AI
description: AI lab building open-weight and enterprise-grade models plus tooling for real-world deployment.
impact: Strengthens Europe’s AI capability and expands options for controllable, deployable AI stacks.

name: Hugging Face
description: Open-source AI platform and toolchain (models, datasets, libraries, deployment) used globally.
impact: Accelerates AI innovation by making powerful tooling accessible, reproducible, and community-driven.

name: Ledger
description: Security company building hardware and software to secure digital assets and sensitive keys (self-custody infrastructure).
impact: Scaled consumer-grade secure hardware and strengthened ‘trust infrastructure’ for digital ownership.

name: OVHcloud
description: European cloud provider offering infrastructure with strong emphasis on control, cost, and sovereignty options.
impact: Supports regional infrastructure capacity and diversification beyond hyperscaler dependency.

name: Atos / Eviden (HPC & Quantum programs)
description: Advanced computing actor across supercomputing, large-scale systems, and quantum-related initiatives.
impact: Strategic capability for scientific simulation and AI at scale (compute as national/industrial leverage).

name: Air Liquide (Hydrogen & industrial decarbonization)
description: Industrial gases leader developing hydrogen production and infrastructure for industry and mobility.
impact: Enables decarbonization pathways in hard-to-abate sectors through scalable industrial projects.

name: Back Market
description: Marketplace for refurbished electronics, promoting repairability and longer device lifecycles.
impact: Industrializes refurbished consumption and makes circular purchasing feel mainstream.

name: Exotec
description: Warehouse robotics company providing high-density storage and order-fulfillment automation systems.
impact: Raises logistics productivity and resilience as supply chains face labor and volatility constraints.

name: Qonto
description: Business finance platform for SMEs and freelancers (accounts, cards, invoicing, expense workflows, integrations).
impact: Reduces admin overhead and improves operational visibility for small organizations.

name: Devialet
description: Audio engineering and premium hardware company combining acoustics, design, and connected products.
impact: Demonstrates global competitiveness in high-end consumer hardware through engineering-led differentiation.

name: V-MaX (Hypersonic demonstrator)
description: French hypersonic glide demonstrator program with defense, industrial, and research partners.
impact: Builds sovereign capability in hypersonic systems (guidance, materials, flight regimes) and strategic deterrence tech.
